section.name: Download
section.p: Note! Due to complications in the build-process the latest release (0.9) is only available through the maven-repository at Codehaus. If you want to have a more traditional distribution available for 0.9 please contact the mailing lists and we will provide one as soon as possible.
There are several ways to download Nanning:
